details:
noun
- an unexpected hit
= example: an unexpected hit
- tropical fish that resembles a goby and rests quietly on the bottom in shallow water
= synonyms: sleeper goby
- a piece of furniture that can be opened up into a bed
- pajamas with feet
- a passenger car that has berths for sleeping
= synonyms: sleeping car, wagon-lit
- one of the cross braces that support the rails on a railway track
= example: one of the cross braces that support the rails on a railway track
= synonyms: tie, railroad tie, crosstie
- a rester who is sleeping
= synonyms: slumberer
- an unexpected achiever of success
= example: an unexpected achiever of success
- a spy or saboteur or terrorist planted in an enemy country who lives there as a law-abiding citizen until activated by a prearranged signal
